title.value: Pretrainable Geometric Graph Neural Network for Antibody Affinity Maturation
title.justification: Title of the paper as it appears at the beginning.
title.quote: Pretrainable Geometric Graph Neural Network for Antibody Affinity Maturation

extractions.description: The paper presents GearBind, a pretrainable deep neural network that leverages geometric message passing and contrastive pretraining to model interactions within protein complexes. It outperforms previous models on the SKEMPI v2 dataset and successfully optimizes antibody affinity, specifically for the SARS-CoV-2 Omicron strain, achieving a 17-fold increase in binding affinity.

type.justification: The paper performs empirical experiments and validations to demonstrate the effectiveness of GearBind in optimizing antibody affinity.
type.quote: Through a series of in silico experiments, we validate GearBind‚Äôs superior performance and demonstrate the benefit of pretraining.

name.justification: The research focuses on using deep learning techniques to solve problems related to computational modeling in biology, particularly antibody affinity maturation.
name.quote: Our strategy yields a high success rate with up to 17-fold affinity increase. GearBind proves to be an effective tool in narrowing the search space for in vitro antibody affinity maturation, underscoring the utility of geometric deep learning and adept pre-training in macromolecule interaction modeling.

name.justification: The primary technique used in GearBind involves geometric message passing, a method within geometric deep learning.
name.quote: GearBind, a deep neural network that leverages multi-level geometric message passing to model the nuanced antibody-antigen interactions.

name.justification: The paper involves predicting the binding free energy changes based on protein structural data, which aligns with the domain of protein structure prediction.
name.quote: utilizing contrastive learning-based pretraining on protein structural data allows the incorporation of vital structural insights for predicting ‚àÜ‚àÜùê∫‚Çö‚Çê‚Çë‚Çú‚Çú-values.

name.justification: GearBind is explicitly mentioned as the deep neural network model introduced and used in the paper.
name.quote: This paper presents GearBind, a pretrainable deep neural network designed to be effective for in silico affinity maturation.

is_contributed.justification: GearBind is the primary novel contribution of the paper.
is_contributed.quote: This paper presents GearBind, a pretrainable deep neural network designed to be effective for in silico affinity maturation.

is_executed.justification: The paper describes multiple in silico experiments, with computations suggesting GPU usage.
is_executed.quote: Through a series of in silico experiments, we validate GearBind‚Äôs superior performance and demonstrate the benefit of pretraining.

is_compared.justification: The performance of GearBind is empirically validated and compared against other models on specific datasets like SKEMPI v2.
is_compared.quote: GearBind outperforms previous state-of-the-art methods in multiple evaluation metrics.

referenced_paper_title.justification: GearBind is an original contribution in this paper so there is no referenced paper title.

name.justification: The SKEMPI v2 dataset is explicitly mentioned in the context of training and validating GearBind.

aliases: Structural Kinetic and Energetic database of Mutant Protein Interactions v2.0

name.justification: PDB is mentioned as the dataset used for pretraining the GearBind model using unlabeled protein structures.
name.quote: For pretraining, we retrieved a dataset of 123,505 experimentally-determined protein structures from the Protein Data Bank (PDB).

referenced_paper_title.justification: Title of the referenced paper for the PDB dataset is provided.

name.justification: TorchDrug is explicitly mentioned as the library used for model implementation.
name.quote: We implement our model with the TorchDrug library.
